ygData.subject: Re: Lore stuff (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: - ... It *shouldn t* work if it s at a spawn site and they are camping...because camping is completely legal...as is farming.  When whatever camped monster
ygData.messageBody:
-
>No, all you have to claim is that you're trying to attack the
>monsters there, and the bigger guys keep taking it every time.
>In this case, their misguided harassment definition (only
>harassment if it's aimed at an individual) works in your
>favor since they are literally killing everything you attack.


It *shouldn't* work if it's at a spawn site and they are camping...because
camping is completely legal...as is farming. When whatever camped monster
spawns, it's totally up for grabs. Just because the higher levels get it
every time doesn't make it a case of harassment. It would only be
harassment if you moved to another location and they followed you, doing the
same thing :)

Alluran
